participant_1.background:
I have a dog named Petrucci who always knows how to cheer me up when my inner critic is being too harsh.
i am a mother of two beautiful boys.
i only eat organic food.
I spend my days trying to learn more about the gambling business.
i still dream about going to paris and designing clothes.

participant_2.background:
I have two passions: challenging myself and volunteering with my son's Boy Scout troop.
i like wide , open spaces.
I like to design jewelry to relax.
My biggest fear is that my mother will die before I get to tell her how much I love her.
I'd love to share some of my crochet patterns with you!

content.text: Not much! Just crocheting some new earrings.
That sounds cool! I wish I could crochet.
Oh it's easy! I'm sure you could do it with a little practice.
You should! It's really relaxing and it's a great way to de-stress.
That's what I need! I've been so stressed out lately.
Just a lot of work and family stuff.
I know the feeling. I'm always busy with work and my son's Boy Scout troop.
That's great that you're so involved with your son's troop.
Thanks! It's a lot of work, but it's really rewarding.
I'm sure it is. My boys are too young for Boy Scouts yet, but I'm looking forward to getting them involved when they're older.
It's a great experience for them. They learn a lot about teamwork, leadership, and self-reliance.
That sounds awesome! I'm really glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks! I hope you're able to find some time to relax soon. You deserve it!
